item.description:
Hello, Java Meetup members!
Lets gather and talk Java - Java programming, Java IDE's, Java frameworks, Java future, Java's competition, Java projects, Java successes, Java failures, Java tools, ...

Our meetings are personal, engaging and everybody is sharing in the topic at hand.

Come and share your experience with us. Spring is here, making it easier to come to the venue and enjoy the company of Java enthusiasts.

-------------------------------------------------------------------
!!! I changed the venue to the other BeerWorks in Boston
!!! near Fenway.
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Kaj
P.S.: Welcome to the many new members that joined since the last Meetup. I hope to see you there.
P.P.S.: Thank you to the many members that RSVP (one way or another). This helps me to manage the crowd at the venue.
item.name: The Boston Java March Meetup
